Reviews.Title: “Nothing special”
Reviews.Author: Radek T Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: It's rather hostel than hotel. We had double room, which was very small and cold. The breakfast consisted of bread, cheese, sausages and eggs. The staff was friendly. Only thing why you could accept this price is it's location. I recommend this hotel for travelers who don't want to bother with public transport and stay there for few nights.

Reviews.Title: “Good location for a short stay”
Reviews.Author: Alongkorn P Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: It,s located near the grand central station. Only a few minute walk. We book a four bed room for a night and find it is ok, nothing special about it. The size of towels are varied from a regular one to a door mat size. Carpet is a bit runoff. Need more toilets though. Breakfast is great.

Reviews.Title: “EXELENT”
Reviews.Author: graham a Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: great staff great HOTEL 10 out 0f 10 rooms undergoing up grade will be perfect when finished shower a bit of a let down could do with a tart up otherwise its very good for the price exelent location near everything you could want breakfast is in the price too

Reviews.Title: “dirthy, unsafe, humid”
Reviews.Author: Christine V Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: We payed â‚¬95 for a very bad accomodation. The sheets were not looking fresh and there was make-up on the bathing towels that was surely not from us! The odour of humidity was everywhere. In the corner there was mould and the wall paper was falling down. I never saw a room like this! Bad bad bad!

Reviews.Title: “Hotel? More like hostel...”
Reviews.Author: Tamara R
Reviews.Content: This place was dreadful from start to finish. We booked for 2 nights and when the deposit was collected, they took the whole damn lot. The hotel was filthy from top to bottom, I wouldn't be happy with a rat sleeping here let alone paying customers! When we arrived the reception was locked with no note, eventually after much knocking the receptionist appeared from the loo and told me off for making noise! Shared bathroom (with other rooms) with barely enough room to move. No bin in either the bedroom or the bathroom. We couldn't bear to stay the second night and asked for a refund which I still haven't received 4 months later. I wrote several times complaining and asking for refund of second night and never heard back. Don't stay here. I'd like to stay it was cheap and that you get what you pay for it but it wasn't cheap. I've stayed in hostels for less and they were cleaner and safer!

Reviews.Title: “AWFUL - DO NOT GO!!”
Reviews.Author: Katriona R
Reviews.Content: Went with a few friends for a nice holiday and ended up in the most disgusting, foul, smelly, cold place on earth! You may think 'it wont be as bad as it sounds' but trust me when I say it was horrible! I would NOT pay to stay there again!! Beds = dirty! Room = cold! Overall = terrible!

Reviews.Title: “cheap n cheerful”
Reviews.Author: darren w
Reviews.Content: just spent 2 nights here last weekend ,,after reading the reviews i wasnt sure ,,but arrived great staff which were there 24 hrs a day reasonable sized single room at rear of hotel. which was really quiet didnt hear a thing from hotel or outside. the room and bed were clean had tv sink fan etc , breakfast was good enough to set you up for a mornings walking about ,,, OK the dÃ©cor isnt up to much but they are slowly decorating by the looks of it , but travellers remember this is crazy Amsterdam not some swanky upmarket place if you want quality here your going to pay through the nose for it,, this was a great location 2 mins from centraal station and about the same into the heart of this part of dam.... so all in all my stay here was pretty good and reasonably priced ,,, yep would stay here again

Reviews.Title: “Not as bad as it sounds......”
Reviews.Author: Tom W
Reviews.Content: Right, we booked the hotel neutraal without reading the reviews...so when i read them i was not looking forward to staying there at all....in fact i couldnt get excited for my trip to amsterdam thinkin that i was about to stay in a "hell-hole". when we arrived we were greeted by a friendly receptionist.....and the room we got was fine...clean, decent size. Fair enough the toilets are shared...but u get what u pay for. the toilet and shower were clean, they DID have locks on!! OK its not the best hotel in the world and i probably would stay elsewhere if i did go back to amsterdam!! but just dont believe all the rubbish reviews that r on here.... location is excellent!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “You need negatives to rate this "place"”
Reviews.Author: JennyR210455
Reviews.Content: STAY AWAY is the best advice I can give. No one on reception when we arrived. Had to lug our suitcases up 2 flights of stairs. We had booked a room with ensuite - NON EXISTENT! We had to cross the hall and use a shared toilet and shower (GROTTY!) The room stunk and the beds were poor quality. Walls were thin, we could hear other people and what they were doing. We requested another room but were told they didn't have any. We had originally booked for 2 nights but it was so bad we didn't hang around for breakfast, we booked out the next day and moved on. DISGRACEFUL!!!! I agree with other people, this was the worst hotel ever!

Reviews.Title: “Only for sleep”
Reviews.Author: fsalmasi
Reviews.Content: I stayed there for one night, I got in at 11 pm and left at 8 am. I needed a place close to the central station and this place was good for that purpose. I got a private room and there was a single bed in it. The breakfast wasn't impressive at all. I didn't see bed bugs in my room. The bathroom and shower was shared. I would recommend it only for the last resort.

Reviews.Title: “Bring in the bulldozer”
Reviews.Author: jackherer30
Reviews.Content: Ill keep this one short.when a hotel room,or any room for that matter, has blood splattered on the walls you know your in the wrong place.on the damrak facing meyers canal tours.i genuinely feared for my life here.stay well away

Reviews.Title: “Amazingly RUBBISH!”
Reviews.Author: wordzo2002
Reviews.Content: Well me and 3 of my friends stayed here for two nights to end a backpacking trip round Belgium and Holland, and this is what I could only describe as the pits ha! I've visted Amsterdam many times and stayed at some right bad places but this just topped it ha! I've travelled around so believe me when I say do not stay here. The value is crap. We paid 120 euros for a 4 bedroom with no shower or toilet and would not like to think of what has gone on in there. We wasn't assed though. We was there for one reason and that was to sleep. I just felt sorry for the man I saw checking in at reception with his wife. Its a dive. Don't stay there just for the sheer fact its a ripp off. I asked if they could look after our bags until we had to leave for our flight after check in and they said it would be 5 euros per person. Ha! Unbelievable. Amsterdam good as ever!

Reviews.Title: “Hit rock bottom”
Reviews.Author: Bobslocks
Reviews.Content: This place is a s..t whole for want of better words . Six of us went to the dam and had great time there but this hotel is thevworst grottiest smelliest place I've had the pleasure of staying in the beds were well used the wall paer was hanging off the wall there was s..t smeared into the Walls the windows were rotten in fact it pretty much should of had a health warning on it. It's cheap but not cheap enough u could not pay me to stay at this grot whole ever again oh not to mention the bugs that were crawling over my mates glass,s in the morning

Reviews.Title: “really dirty rooms!”
Reviews.Author: phillips25
Reviews.Content: just stayed at the hotel neutraal (amsterdam) for two nights and what a disappointment! we paid for a double room with a shower the rooms were discusing. the beds were really bad and the mattresses must be very old the shower was pointless water going everywhere no shower holder and cold running water. staff not very pleasent on welcome desk. our room also smelt really bad and the noise on a night time was unreal! all of all we did enjoy our stay but not at this hotel would NOT recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT GO TO THIS "HOTEL" THE MOST DISGUSTING PLACE I HAVE EVER SEEN.”
Reviews.Author: jamievegan
Reviews.Content: I NEVER WRITE REVIEWS. NEVER. But when I walked into this room my first thought was "I have to warn others about this place." We payed 100 euros for ONE night (which seems low compared to what others have payed on this website) and we slept with our shoes and all clothes on. The shower was disgusting qnd the toilet was even worse. The website they have, has photos on it that must be from another hotel. The rooms are dark, the walls look like they have been puked, pissed and god-knows-what-elsed on and the thought that breakfast is "included" in the price makes me sick. If their "hotel rooms" look like this, I can't imagine what is in their food. THE LOCATION IS NOT WORTH THE BUG AND RAT INFESTED, FILTHY, UNCORFORT OF THIS HELL HOLE.

Reviews.Title: “Run AWAY!!! Dirty, Overpriced, Scam Artist!!!”
Reviews.Author: Jade_McCullough
Reviews.Content: You couldnt walk on the floor without shoes on, it was soggy. There was something that resembeled vomit on the walls. We went 4 days without showering, for fear of the disgusting group shower and washed outselves in the little sink. One morning, I accidentally spilled coffe and the bedding, I took it to them immediatly so It would not stain. They never gave me new bedding, so I slept without blankets for two nights after requesting more each morning. The worst part is, they overcharged me by $150 and have refused to credit the money back (since its out of the country I have no rights, so DONT use a credit card there!). I paid over $200 american dollars a NIGHT for a room for "3", that wasnt even big enough for one person. It was the most expensive hotel Ive ever booked. The website is BOGUS there is nowhere in the place that looks like the photos they have posted. RUN dont walk away from this place. It is in a good location, if thats all you care about.

Reviews.Title: “great location, but thats about it”
Reviews.Author: eyepaulEngland
Reviews.Content: great value if you dont mind staying somewhere thats a bit old and unkept. price ruled my head with this booking and should of known better. great location but thats about it.

Reviews.Title: “Avoid this s#it hole at all costs...”
Reviews.Author: SaraKeef
Reviews.Content: Well as soon as you walk in the door you know what your getting...and it gets worse!! Rude service kicks it off quite nicely....followed by the trek through wheelie bins (yep...in the hall first floor) past broken glassed doors through the depressing dark corridors until you reach your room. The rooms are tiny and dirty and really is like a scene from 'Hostel'...awful 70's furniture etc. The toilets and showers are worse still. Shower didn't have a light so you couldn't lock it, then the shower head was broken so it was like a tap. Shocking that something like this can still happen in these times. Please stay away so that it hopefully will have to shut. It's position is lovely but really, walk a few mins and get a better hotel, it will be worth it!!

Reviews.Title: “Have you ever seen the film HOSTEL ? ....”
Reviews.Author: kerianddan
Reviews.Content: This is the most disgusting, repulsive hotel I have ever encountered in my entire life .. Upon arrival the unfriendly staff usherd us to the rear of the hotel and up the poorly lit steep staircases, there was strong smell of feaces and urine throughout the corridors coming from the most cramped unhygenic shared bathroom facilities if you can even call them that it resembled a hole in the floor were people obvouisly just aimed and hoped for the best . . . The windows from our room which looked onto a open air hallway accesible to anyone did not shut, the room consisted of a bed which was dirty, a sink that did not work and also a tv which also did not work, the next morning we complained and were moved room however were charged an extra 75euro just for the privalage of our own bathroom which featured exposed wires, broken tiles, a bottle of bleach with no lid on it, a shower with mould and only cold water which flooded the whole bathroom after 3 minutes of use because the shower curtain was just plain useless .. the carpet, bed, walls and curtains had the most revolting stains on them which i wont go in to detail about but you will probably have a good idea what they are. The room had many exposed wires the tv didnt work, mould, damp and torn wallpaper, the bed was filthy and covered in hairs and the room looked as though it hadn't been decorated or been introduced to a hoover since the 1960s oh but it did feature a "minibar" when opened admitted the putred smell of what i could call a rotting corpse of some sort .... Also beware of the random strangers who roam the halls of the hotel and try to stumble into your room at all hours of the morning. I'm not usually one to complain about matters such as this,I've stayed in many cramped filthy 18-30 holiday hotels over the years, but this place is in a class of its own and I thought it would have been neglagent and cruel Not to warn others of the HORRORS this hotel features!

Reviews.Title: “So disgusting it was Laughable!!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: yvonne0212
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this "Hotel" for one night. Like alot of others, we didn't book before we arrived in Amsterdam. Big Mistake!!!!!!! We asked for a double room, we got a box size room, no view, curtains hanging off the rails, and we couldn't see the decor because it was so dark. I complained and was given another room - which wasn't much better!! the wall paper was hanging off the walls, the carpet was filthy, as were the windows and bathroom. The only good thing about this room was the view we had and the fact that McD's was downstairs, because in the morning. the breakfast was a joke and ended up going down for a mcmuffin!! DO NOT BOOK THIS HOTEL, DO NOT BOOK THIS HOTEL!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “I never wrote reviews before, but for this horrible hotel I think should warn you!!”
Reviews.Author: fifiki
Reviews.Content: I dont even know why this is called a hotel. I cant think of anything nice to say about it. Everything in it stinks. It made my stay in Amsterdam unforgettable in a bad way. The toilets are so dirty. We could not even pretend, we had to leave Amsterdam without showering because the showers were terrible. At least we were only staying for a night. It was horrible...please dont say I didnt warn you. My goodness.

Reviews.Title: “Better than sleeping on the floor at Schiphol”
Reviews.Author: trbeer
Reviews.Content: The best thing about this place was its convenient location near Centraal Station. That and the price compared to some of the marble-foyered places nearby. Otherwise this place served only as a port in the storm of the Iceland volcanic ash chaos. You pretty much know what you're getting into when you walk in the door. Unfortunately the online photos seem to paint a much prettier pic. Didn't actually SEE any roaches or bedbugs, but the feeling they were there persisted. Staff was friendly enough, even marginally concerned about our plight.

Reviews.Title: “Bed bug bites are the least of your worries!!!”
Reviews.Author: Johnnygid
Reviews.Content: I stayed in the hotel neutraal due to needing a triple room for the group to stay in. I don't know why I didn't check trip advisor as I normally do and would have avoided at all costs if I had of done. I suppose the main reason was I was booking for a stag trip, which usually means your not bothered about your digs, but after my friends and I came up in lesions from bed bug bites, I thought this is pushing it too far!! The room itself is so badly painted and decorated you would have thought Stevie Wonder had done it himself... Paint varied from lime green on the door, to white on the wood work (which was meant to be left varnished). The communal shower was like something out of a horror movie and the toilet was unpleasant to stay the least! The service was sometimes ok, but generally ranged from aggressive to lax. So to sum up, I can happily say that I have stayed in teh worst hotel in the world and payed 150euros a night for the pleasure.. Please don't make the same mistake!!!

Reviews.Title: “The worst hotel I've ever been”
Reviews.Author: Holdenn
Reviews.Content: That's it, the worst hotel I've ever been. Room with no window, horrible, looked like a hospital, a very old one. Very noisy, I thought I was in a brothel or something similar, and I changed the room, but they're all the same! I stayed here 2 years ago, and still trying to forget! The only good thing, is wuite good located, but that's all, don't make the same mistake I made...goy to any other hotel! (Pd.: don't even think The Flying Pig neither) Bueno pues eso, que lo peor de lo peor. El peor hotel en el que he estado y con diferencia, y era la segunda vez que iba a Amsterdam, pero grave error de elecciÃ³n. Comienzo. fue llegar y nos dieron una "habitacion" por llaarlo de alguna manera con ventana (q no se abria) en el techo pero sin persiana.. hayq q tener en cuenta q en amsterdam en verano anochece muy tarde y amanece muy pronto.. por lo que o duemes las 4 horas que hay sin luz, o te pones un antifaz.. El baÃ±o era compartido, eso sÃ­, esta primera habitacion tenia ducha.. que era lo que yo creia inicialmente un armario, pq hay no cabe nadie y encima mojas toda la habitacion...horroroso... Pedimos obviamente cambio de habitacion a la media hora y nos pusieron en la otra q tenian libre, no habian mas.. Esta no tenia ni ventanas, solo que una pared ea como de cirstal ahumado que al otro lado se intuia (y se oia...vaya si se oia) una caldera enorme que ademas estaba iluminada y daba un calor del copon... La habitacion parecia de psiquiatrico.. dos camas mal puestas, mitad de la pared de madera cutre y la otra mal pintada, el suelo ya ni me acuerdo pero bueno... Total, la sensacion de claustrofobia brutal..teniamos que dormir con la puerta de la habitacion medio abierta!! aun me pregunto por que no me fui corriendo de ahi el primer dia... tonto de mi. El de la recepcion que pasaba de todo..decia q era una habiacion normal... normal no sÃ© donde. Ademas, valia unos 90 euros por noche... nada barato.. es que ni pagandome me quedaria ahi de nuevo. Eso si, bien situado.. solo faltaria que encima estuviese lejos, vamos... Pasamos 3 noches, y reconozco que ha sido la peor escapada de mi vida gracias a este hotel...daba un mal rollo volver al hotel por la noche que ni imaginais..y eso que me pasaba el dia fuera por tal de ni verlo! O sea que si lo habias pensado.. no!!! no vayais aqui ni locos!!1 Tampoco se os ocurra ir al albergue The Flying Pig que es del palo... yo no fui, pero si mi pareja anteriormente y otro tanto de lo mismo

Reviews.Title: “Would not recommend it !”
Reviews.Author: AmelieCalais
Reviews.Content: I came to this hotel with my boyfriend, but we didn't really had the choice as we hadn't booked before coming in this city - maybe a bad idea ! The room was a triple dirty noisy small humid room. 135 euros for a night, no sanitary in the room (except a washbowl with no warm water in the evening). It's well situated, the only good point I could find. Above all, it was really too expansive ! The staff was ok. But they had been lucky that we had nowhere esle to sleep...

Reviews.Title: “AVOID at all costs”
Reviews.Author: dart22
Reviews.Content: When we arrived in amsterdam, we had no accommodation booked and ended up staying at this hotel. Location is just a few minutes walk from central station and Dam Square, in front of the canal where all the tour boats leave. The 'hotel' is over priced for sure. It's absolutely filthy. Mould on the walls. Damp on the ceilings. Filthy toilets/shower (if you're brave enough to take a shower there). The hotel is open 24 hours and everyone and anyone can enter it. It is exceptionally noisy and contains all sorts of people you wouldn't really want to meet. You could well fear for own safety in this place. Amsterdam is an expensive city but pay the extra 20â‚¬ a night to stay somewhere safer.

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting!”
Reviews.Author: amieface
Reviews.Content: This hotel was disgusting. We had a mouse living and pooping under our beds! Dirty room, dirty shower, dirty toilet (which are both across the hall!) The wallpaper was peeling off, sink leaked, window didnt open properly. We put our bags on the table so they didnt have to touch the floor and we had to constantly wear shoes or our socks would go brown with dirt. This is the worst hotel ever. It should be shut down.

Reviews.Title: “why does god hate us so much?”
Reviews.Author: amsterdam/crew
Reviews.Content: we stepped off the plane on a sunday morning glowing with excitement about our group trip to amsterdam. some of us had been before and were full off stories about the good naature of the dutch and the pride in their settlings. our world was about to be damaged severely. the musty smell of rotten carpet, the unaccepting snarl of the receptionist an d the dickensian workhouse feel of the micro-bedrooms all added to our joint journey into the abyss. amsterdam was lovely, if not a bit tarnished by our knowledge that at some point in the next 24hrs we would have to return the hotel neutraal that out of fear we only referred to as the place where bad things happen. if you have done bad things in your life and feel god hasn't punished you enough check into hotel neutraal-no guests for more than half an hour.

Reviews.Title: “i will return here”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: i stayed at hotel neutral may 11-16 06,stayed 2nd floor. very quiet, across hall from shower-toilet. clean rooms and bathroom! the management was very friendly.. i walked in no with reservations asked for 3 nites, ended up staying 5 by choice. good location, fair price good location across from canal tour boats, lots of resturants easy to find! 1 block to redlight district-shopping, everything you came for! i will return there my next visit to amsterdam .... morris

Reviews.Title: “Noisy and shabby place”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This is definetely the worst place we have ever been. We stayed 2 nights in a double room in this so called hotel. Our room had a sweat nauseous odour which was probably cannabis from the previous occupants. We paid 65 Euros a night and you can find much better accomodation in Amsterdam in this prize range. We shared bathroom and toilet with a group consisting of 10 British teenage boys who came home at 4 o'clock in the morning and ran yelling up and down the corridor. They also played Manneken Pis from the balcony next to our window... This has of course nothing to do with the staff, but you should be aware of that this place is really noisy and shabby. The breakfast is boring.

Reviews.Title: “Weakest coffee ever !”
Reviews.Author: geoffboxer
Reviews.Content: We were forced to stay at this place as we couldnt find anywhwere else. The best you can say is it had two beds in a small basic room and a wash basin. Showers and toilet were along the corridor. Payment was required up front and then 5% added for payment by Plastic. The first morning I went for breakfast which was included in the room price. For the rest of the stay I didnt bother. The coffee was only coffee by name and it was a lite brown mixture that tasted of nothing. A half a loaf of sliced bread lay on the small table together with a few slices of cheese and some curled up process meat product. The man on duty proudley said with a smile on his face, Help yourself. I did ... next morning I went out and got a proper breakfast at a nearby Cafe.

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Neutraal
HotelInfo.Address: Damrak 8, Amsterdam 1012 LG, The Netherlands
